title: i wonder if riot has any big plans for akali...
body:
the rework is now... old you could say.

her banrate was CONSTANTLY in the top 5, her winrate was never above 50% and she is constantly getting either buffed or nerfed.

if she gets 2-3 early kills, its over. she will 1combo anything that she sees.

idk but imo the rework is a huge fail. people dont wanna play against her. people that play her still didnt master her. and riot doesnt know what to do with her either.

you reverted kogmaws w, which kinda changed his playstyle a bit. maybe its time to revert/rework akali aswell.
and if you rework her again just remember: riotblastoise might love champs that are overloaded with sustain and mobility, BUT NOONE ELSE DOES!

replies.body:
you guys who keep asking for akali to be reverted, just stop.
there is no revert on a VGU, never happens and literally never will happen.
well SOMEONE has to care about the game.
Kind of a shame about the Kog'maw rework being reverted, too. I liked machine gun Kog.

i guess riot wasnt happy with the fact that pro players stopped kitting and just pressed right click once, because kitting would lose you dps with 5 attacks per second.
it also caused several reports of high elo players starting to script with kog
also the 5 attacks per second NEVER was 5 attacks per second because it was buggy/never coded in a way like this.
The main problem is her old kit was way more toxic then the new one.
